item.title: One million without heat and water after Russian strikes, Ukraine says
item.description: Efforts are continuing to restore services in Dnipropetrovsk, officials say, after wide-spread attacks in the southeast.

item.title: US immigration agent fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis
item.description: Trump says the woman was attempting to run over ICE agents. Local leaders disagree.

item.title: Cambodia extradites alleged scam mastermind to China after arrest
item.description: Chen Zhi is charged with turning his business into a front for fraud hubs that stole from people around the world.

item.title: US halts assistance to Somalia over claims food aid was illegally seized
item.description: Donald Trump's administration has a zero-tolerance policy for waste, a US official tweeted.

item.title: Inside the sub-zero lair of the world's most powerful computer
item.description: Faisal Islam gets rare access to Willow - Google's quantum computer.
